mapper.insert: insert into mkdir_table(uid, FolderName, UpFolderId, startTime) values (#{uid}, #{FolderName}, #{UpFolderId}, #{startTime})
mapper.select: select mid from mkdir_table where uid=#{uid} and UpFolderId=#{UpFolderId}
mapper.update: update mkdir_table set FolderName=#{FolderName} where mid=#{mid}
mapper.select: select UpFolderId from mkdir_table where mid=#{mid}
select * from mkdir_table where uid=#{uid} and FolderName like CONCAT('%',#{FolderName},'%')
